title: Herb crusted leg of lamb
ingredients: ['1.5-3kg (5-7 lb) leg of lamb, fat trimmed (your butcher can do this)', '5 tablespoons Dairygold', '2 large cloves garlic, crushed', '1 1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoon pepper', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1 handful fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried oregano']
